name: CategoryTheory.Comma.locallySmall
initialProofState:
A : Type u₁
B : Type u₂
T : Type u₃
inst✝⁴ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} A
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₂, u₂} B
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₃, u₃} T
L : CategoryTheory.Functor A T
R : CategoryTheory.Functor B T
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.LocallySmall.{w, v₁, u₁} A
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.LocallySmall.{w, v₂, u₂} B
⊢ CategoryTheory.LocallySmall.{w, max v₁ v₂, max (max u₂ u₁) v₃} (CategoryTheory.Comma L R)
decl:
instance Comma.locallySmall
    (L : A ⥤ T) (R : B ⥤ T) [LocallySmall.{w} A] [LocallySmall.{w} B] :
    LocallySmall.{w} (Comma L R) where
  hom_small X Y := small_of_injective.{w}
      (f := fun g ↦ (⟨g.left, g.right⟩ : _ × _))
        (fun _ _ _ ↦ by aesop)

name: CategoryTheory.StructuredArrow.locallySmall
initialProofState:
B : Type u₂
T✝ : Type u₃
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₂, u₂} B
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₃, u₃} T✝
S : T✝
T : CategoryTheory.Functor B T✝
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.LocallySmall.{w, v₂, u₂} B
⊢ CategoryTheory.LocallySmall.{w, v₂, max u₂ v₃} (CategoryTheory.StructuredArrow S T)
decl:
instance StructuredArrow.locallySmall (S : T) (T : B ⥤ T)
    [LocallySmall.{w} B] :
    LocallySmall.{w} (StructuredArrow S T) :=
  Comma.locallySmall _ _

name: CategoryTheory.CostructuredArrow.locallySmall
initialProofState:
A : Type u₁
T : Type u₃
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} A
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₃, u₃} T
S : CategoryTheory.Functor A T
X : T
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.LocallySmall.{w, v₁, u₁} A
⊢ CategoryTheory.LocallySmall.{w, v₁, max u₁ v₃} (CategoryTheory.CostructuredArrow S X)
decl:
instance CostructuredArrow.locallySmall (S : A ⥤ T) (X : T)
    [LocallySmall.{w} A] :
    LocallySmall.{w} (CostructuredArrow S X) :=
  Comma.locallySmall _ _

name: CategoryTheory.Over.locallySmall
initialProofState:
T : Type u₃
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₃, u₃} T
X : T
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.LocallySmall.{w, v₃, u₃} T
⊢ CategoryTheory.LocallySmall.{w, v₃, max u₃ v₃} (CategoryTheory.Over X)
decl:
instance Over.locallySmall (X : T) [LocallySmall.{w} T] :
    LocallySmall.{w} (Over X) :=
  CostructuredArrow.locallySmall _ _

name: CategoryTheory.Under.locallySmall
initialProofState:
T : Type u₃
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₃, u₃} T
X : T
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.LocallySmall.{w, v₃, u₃} T
⊢ CategoryTheory.LocallySmall.{w, v₃, max u₃ v₃} (CategoryTheory.Under X)
decl:
instance Under.locallySmall (X : T) [LocallySmall.{w} T] :
    LocallySmall.{w} (Under X) :=
  StructuredArrow.locallySmall _ _
